Published November 20 2014

Apple's E-Book settlement finalized

Apple's E-Book settlement finalized — U.S. District Judge Denise Cote has approved Apple’s agreement to pay $450 Million for “conspiring with five publishers to raise e-book prices.”

Enjoy your day.
